no.uio.duo.migrate201to30

Class MultiFileAnalyser

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.uio.duo.TraverseDSpace
      • no.uio.duo.migrate201to30.MultiFileAnalyser

  • public class MultiFileAnalyser
extends TraverseDSpace
    Script which analyses the entire holdings of a DSpace instance and reports on those items which have more than one file in the ORIGINAL bundle. It also serialises the policies each of those files has and outputs them so they can be easily compared. Produces a CSV for easy analysis.
